name: Effortlessly Coots
description:
What the hell man, coots is just like boarding and skating? what?

W and S (or up/down arrows) to switch lane, Spacebar to Jump, and also to slam when you've jumped.

//Source Code link for moderators

https://github.com/InfernoPyroManiac/CootsGameJam

made for the Ludwig 2023 jam. Please do not complain about the poor quality of the game. If you enjoy the game then I will make a follow-up update and include all the original planned features (got too tight on time for inclusion in the actual jam)!
